publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4782 Mrs Nanette Milne: North East Open Studios 2006—That the Parliament welcomes North East Open Studios from 16 to 25 September 2006; notes that this is Scotland’s largest artist-run open studios event, now in its third year, with 141 studios, workshops, exhibition venues and galleries participating in raising the profile of the visual arts in the north east of Scotland; further notes that this provides a great opportunity for artists, makers and galleries in the north east and for the public to meet them and watch them at work, and congratulates the organisers on what has become a great showcase event for artists in the north east.

S2M-4782 North East Open Studios 2006 (lodged on 12 September 2006) Brian Adam*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Robin Harper*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr David Davidson*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Nora Radcliffe*, Dave Petrie*, Richard Lochhead*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-4782 North East Open Studios 2006 (lodged on 12 September 2006) Bill Aitken*

S2M-4782 Mrs Nanette Milne: North East Open Studios 2006—That the Parliament welcomes North East Open Studios from 16 to 25 September 2006; notes that this is Scotland’s largest artist-run open studios event, now in its third year, with 141 studios, workshops, exhibition venues and galleries participating in raising the profile of the visual arts in the north east of Scotland; further notes that this provides a great opportunity for artists, makers and galleries in the north east and for the public to meet them and watch them at work, and congratulates the organisers on what has become a great showcase event for artists in the north east. Supported by: Brian Adam, Ms Sandra White, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Robin Harper, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Eleanor Scott, Mr David Davidson, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Nora Radcliffe, Dave Petrie, Richard Lochhead, Ms Maureen Watt, Mr Jamie Stone, Bill Aitken, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4782 North East Open Studios 2006 (lodged on 12 September 2006) Mr Ted Brocklebank*
S2M-4782 North East Open Studios 2006 (lodged on 12 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-4782 North East Open Studios 2006 (lodged on 12 September 2006) Shiona Baird*
S2M-4782 North East Open Studios 2006 (lodged on 12 September 2006) Tommy Sheridan*
